meanings.definition: People who have a fear of spiders.
meanings.sent1: Arachnophobes often feel scared when they see a spider.
meanings.sent2: Many arachnophobes avoid going near spiders.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobes at the party screamed when a tiny spider crawled by.
meanings.sent4: Her little brother is such an arachnophobe, he thinks even a toy spider is real.
meanings.sent5: The movie about giant spiders gave the arachnophobes nightmares for weeks.

meanings.definition: Those who experience intense anxiety or panic when confronted with spiders.
meanings.sent1: Arachnophobes may start sweating and shaking at the sight of a spider.
meanings.sent2: When arachnophobes see a spider, they may feel like running away.
meanings.sent3: The arachnophobes in the haunted house screamed louder at the fake spider than the scary ghost.
meanings.sent4: Her friend is such an arachnophobe that even a picture of a spider makes her jump.
meanings.sent5: The arachnophobes in the group therapy session supported each other to overcome their fear.
